Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

::Quatro/Orchestra::

    Quatro wouldn't wait any longer for escorts.  He =
activated a tracking device, then used it to find Iron Raptor.  He walked u=
p to the door of her room, walked in slowly with a shadowy entrance.  

   =
  "I am Quatro, universal bounty hunter.  I have come to hunt down-" Quatro=
 paused, and looked at the screen with the image of Megatron being viewed. =


     Quatro would've continued, but then he would give away his plans to =
kill Megatron.

     "Iron Raptor, perhaps we can discuss this alliance lat=
er, I have to be going.  And don't get in my way," Quatro warned.

     Qua=
tro looked at the screen.

      "Later, Megabum," Quatro said, then contin=
ued heading out of the CF.

       Quatro was outside.  But he stopped and =
remained still.  There were bots here.  Quatro activated his tracking devic=
e.

       "I'm picking up Decepticon signatures," Quatro said.

       Qua=
tro looked around.  He could see Autofire a little bit.

       "Decepticon=
 Autofire in sight range.  Threat level: 95%" Quatro said data aloud.

    =
   Quatro grabbed a smoke bomb, and threw it over by Autofire and whoever w=
as with him.  Then, Quatro quickly fired a plasma-wave from his gun in Auto=
fire's direction.

       Quatro opened his comm-link to all Maximals in an=
d around CF.

        "I've found some Decepticons hiding out here!" Quatro=
 shouted into it.

         Quatro ran into the CF, ready to blast anything=
 that entered, namely, Decepticons or Preds.
